About¶

Questions & feedback¶

diskmap was developed by Tomas Stolker (tomas.stolker@phys.ethz.ch). Feel free to send an email for questions, comments, or suggestions.

Attribution¶

Please cite Stolker et al. (2016) whenever results from diskmap are used in a publication.

Contributing¶

Contributions are very welcome, please consider forking the repository and creating a pull request. Bug reports can be provided by creating an issue on the Github page.
